abstract: Brian X Chen Tech Fix column, in partnership with The Wirecutter, finds that only about 0.6 percent of Black Friday discounts are worthwhile bargains; recommends Internet tools that will allow consumers to find superior deals.
lead_paragraph: Only a small fraction of Black Friday discounts are true bargains, according to the editor of The Wirecutter, a product recommendation site. But there’s a way to check which purchases are worthwhile.

headline.main: Black Friday Deal or Dud? How to Shop Smart This Holiday Season
headline.print_headline: Black Friday Bargains Are Fewer Than You Think

snippet: Only a small fraction of Black Friday discounts are true bargains, according to the editor of The Wirecutter, a product recommendation site. But there’s a way to check which purchases are worthwhile.
